PHRASE.LANG: (Torso/Pants/Shoes) If you believe yourself worthy of wearing his garb, you may don the robe of General Kenobi, one of the great heroes of the Clone Wars. [#Legal]
(Torse/pantalon/chaussures) Si vous vous estimez digne de porter sa tenue, vous pouvez revêtir la robe du général Kenobi, l'un des principaux héros de la Guerre des clones. [#Legal]
(Oberkörper/Hose/Schuhe) Wenn du glaubst, dass du würdigt bist, diese Kleidung zu tragen, darfst du die Robe von General Kenobi anziehen, einem der größten Helden der Klonkriege. [#Legal]
(Torso/pantaloni/scarpe) Se ti ritieni degno di vestire i suoi panni, puoi indossare la tunica del generale Kenobi, uno dei grandi eroi delle Guerre dei cloni. [#Legal]
(Torso/pantalones/zapatos) Si te crees merecedor de este atuendo, podrás vestir la túnica del general Kenobi, uno de los grandes héroes de las Guerras Clon. [#Legal]
(Torso/Pants/Shoes) If you believe yourself worthy of wearing his garb, you may don the robe of General Kenobi, one of the great heroes of the Clone Wars. [#Legal]
